description.black-white:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area. Hit
Pokémon’s Speed stat is reduced.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area. Hit
Pokémon’s Speed stat is reduced.
description.x-y:
The user strikes everything around it
by stomping down on the ground.
This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
